title: Capstone Electrical Engineering Design Project
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: ENGR 301, ENGR 371; COEN 311; ELEC 342 or 364; ELEC 390. Students must complete a minimum of 75 credits in the BEng (Electrical), as well as the C.Edge work term or one co-op work term prior to enrolling. If prerequisites are not satisfied, permission of the Department is required.

title: Topics in Electrical Engineering
prereqCoreqText: Permission of the Department is required.
